reviewTitle: Children are welcome! Family place, best greek food!
review_details: Absolutely awesome host. They don't have the view but more than make up in food an character. Very welcoming.
Really enjoyed learning how the locals fish. Anthi and the crew were amazing, took really good care of us. Thank you.
one of the best meals we had in Croatia. The marinated tuna is to day for. Our waiter was super friendly. Well worth the trip from Hvar.

reviewTitle: Expected better food. Service was excellent!!
review_details: Had a pasta with truffle, the pasta was undercooked (I do like al dente, this as still undercooked), sauce was also tasteless. My wife had turbot which she said was ok, nothing special. we had higher expectation for the food as it does seems like one of the nicest places. The service was impeccable. Very friendly.
Nice place to hide from the crowds. Food as excellent, service was ok. we had lunch and drinks, were a group of 6, everyone was super happy with their food.
nice ambience, the restaurante is sort of hidden, but when inside is lovely. the life music was very good. Best part was the food, delicious. I had their bucatini with meat, it was excellent!

reviewTitle: Very best hotel on the west side of new providence
review_details: Awesome rooms, very big and comfortable, good staff and good dinning options. The hotel has a beautiful pool, the only thing missing would access to a beach. The best option for those visiting family/friends that live in the west...

reviewTitle: Great option for lunch and dinner
review_details: the manicotti with duck is awesome!! great restaurant, good service. Sometimes takes long for lunch, so not ideal for a quick lunch. Their buffalo pork belly is also delicious!! Very nice bar as well, good to have some drinks before dinner
